BindingObjectRateAdjustment.name: BindingObjectRateAdjustment
BindingObjectRateAdjustment.description: Represents the rate adjustments of the usage resource associated with the binding object that's used to charge over consumption.

AdjustmentType.description: The type of rate adjustment related to the associated rate card entry.

AdjustmentValue.description: The value of the rate adjustment based on the adjustment type.

BindingObjectRateCardEntryId.description: The binding object rate card entry associated with the binding object rate adjustment.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last referred to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LowerBound.description: The minimum quantity of the rate adjustment value that can be applied to the binding object rate adjustment record. This must be a positive number that's less than or equal to the upper bound of the tier.

Name.description: The autogenerated identifier for the binding object rate adjustment record.

UpperBound.description: The maximum quantity of the rate adjustment value that can be applied to the binding object rate adjustment record. This must be a positive number. Set this value one digit higher than the quantity you want the tier to include.
